attributes.action: We call on the Labour government to reconsider the proposed welfare reforms.
attributes.additional_details: These changes could negatively impact disabled people, those with long-term illnesses, and low-income households who rely on financial support to live with dignity.
attributes.background: We urge the government to ensure all reforms are based on fair assessments that consider the lived experiences of claimants, guarantee that no claimant is left worse off due to these changes.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
